traits.name: Hold Breath
entries: Snapjaw can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Snapjaw makes three attacks: two with its bite and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 31 (3d10 + 15 damage) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and Snapjaw can't bite another target.

actions.name: Tail
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target not {@condition grappled} by Snapjaw. 24 (2d8 + 15 damage) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
